product_name: REI  Classic Duffel Bag - X Large - Special Buy
long_description: Big and burly, our X Large REI Classic duffel bag doles out more than 5,500 cu. in. of gear-swallowing space and tucks away into a convenient, compact storage pouch when not in use.
short_description: Big and burly, our X Large REI Classic duffel bag doles out more than 5,500 cu. in. of gear-swallowing space and tucks away into a convenient, compact storage pouch when not in use.
